attributes.action: To change the law on disabled parking bays outside homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Introduce legislation to make parking bays at home for disabled driverswith mobility impairments legal and enforceable under the road traffic act

Introduce legislation to make parking bays at home for disabled drivers with mobility impairments legal and enforceable under the road traffic act so that only those who have gone through the strict criteria are the ones who use them.

These bays are given to those who need them. 

1/ Allocate these Disabled Bays to those with Mobility problems who have substantial difficulty walking from their homes to their cars.

2/ Allocate a bay via Badge/ House Number so that bay is solely for use of person it is allocated to.

The government says they want to help disabled people then its time to change the law and prove to us they mean what they say

Living with a disability can be hard enough,please help me change it
